query:
SELECT m.id, m.conversation_id, m.role, LEFT(m.content, 100) as content_preview, m.created_at 
FROM messages m
WHERE m.conversation_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM conversations ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 3
)
ORDER BY m.conversation_id, m.created_at
LIMIT 20;
command:

FROM messages m

  SELECT id FROM conversations ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 3
)
ORDER BY m.conversation_id, m.created_at
